body_html: @Hafplo It is likely associated with the groud truth. In .config file under object_detection, see if you can capture some eval results. In the meantime, try to change eval_config.num_examples to the size of evalution data, also change eval_input_reader.shuffle to true.
body_text: @Hafplo It is likely associated with the groud truth. In .config file under object_detection, see if you can capture some eval results. In the meantime, try to change eval_config.num_examples to the size of evalution data, also change eval_input_reader.shuffle to true.
body: @Hafplo It is likely associated with the groud truth. In .config file under object_detection, see if you can capture some eval results. In the meantime, try to change `eval_config.num_examples` to the size of evalution data, also change `eval_input_reader.shuffle` to true.
